price: Moses said, “Your appointment is the festival day[14]; let the people be gathered at forenoon[15].”
arabic: قَالَ مَوۡعِدُكُمۡ يَوۡمُ ٱلزِّينَةِ وَأَن يُحۡشَرَ ٱلنَّاسُ ضُحٗى
footnotes:
[14] So that more people could witness the event.
 [15] So that people could see Allah’s signs clearly.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla mawʿidukum yawmu al-zīnati wa-an yuḥ'shara al-nāsu ḍuḥan
